title: "We decided to buff Aatrox, particularly his Q"
body: by making it global and putting it on Galio

replies.body: am i the only one who dislikes his new look? time will tell with his abilities and numbers, but purely on looks he looks rather doofy...

Yeah I don't like it either. He's less Gargoyle and more like some weird demacian statue. Overdimensed, just weird. But I am not Galio main so it doesn't bother me, I just hope they'll eventually make Gargoyle champion now that Galio isn't one.
To be fair, gargoyles _are_ just living grotesques. If he looks like a Demacian statue, then he's exactly how a Demacian gargoyle _should_ look.
But it isn't Galio. It's more like a champ being deleted and replaced than anything. They did the same thing with Sion, but he was a big mess of a champ.
It's not supposed to be "Galio", just like like Sion. It's entirely intended to be considered a new champion.
I hope they don't do this to urgot and my main Evelynn. Eve already had a splash art update in season 6 and I love it, last thing I want is for them to scrap it.
Given she got that splash update, I'm willing to bet her VGU will be fairly close to her current look (see: WW).
If they'll like it they may keep the design. The Debonair Galio skin looks nearly the same. It's no the same, it's updated, but the design is kept.
Galio is neither healthy nor is he well liked so it makes sense that they create a mostly new champion.
Yikes

At least sion retained some of the things from his old self

The shield

Stacking hp on minions and champ kills

And his ult was basically remade into his passive.
...that's exactly what happened in a sense. He's "The Colossus" now.

He's not grotesque though. He's more like he's trying to look noble, immaculate, and cool, but he looks like a failed disney project.

The texture and modeling is smooth because it's updated, but the overall look isn't really particularly intimidating or demacian.

Is he grotesque? No, not in the slightest. But he absolutely looks like _a_ grotesque that Demacia would have. Maybe even they wouldn't use grotesques that are quite as large, but still, it's not hard to imagine Demacia architecture having these figures that are nonetheless monstrous yet still have a righteous pride and strength to them.
Shoulda just made him into a turret with wings
To be fair he was created by a demacian.  It makes sense for him to look demacian in style and Gargoyles _are_ statues.  He is just a construct too.

That'swhat he means with "overdimensed". He keeps too true to this nature, because it's a boring nature. Gargoyles are more epic. But that's just our opinion. Maybe some people like the new statue look.

Personally I think people just need a bit more time to adjust to his new look.  It was very shocking and not at all what anyone expected.  Heck I had a full minute of "WTF?" when watching his teaser.  That being said the look has started to grow on me.  I think it will just take some time for a lot of people.

> [{quoted}](name=Nostormo,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tJh35HEW,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2017-03-06T21:45:58.081+0000)
>
> Yeah I don't like it either. He's less Gargoyle and more like some weird demacian statue. Overdimensed, just weird. But I am not Galio main so it doesn't bother me, I just hope they'll eventually make Gargoyle champion now that Galio isn't one.

But a gargoyle is a weird statue.
They turned him away from the Gargoyle and made him more into this Patron God of Demacia kind of thing. Personally I love how he looks now and I'd be interested in trying him

He looks so dull.
His wings are still tiny and pissy and the colour sheme is so dull and boring
Did you not see his skins? They all look better.

Why would riot not at least try their best remaking the classic model since it's the one that most people have and might have? Look at trashy me, buying warwick when i have none of his skins, i dont play him, and just because his classic skin looked fucking cool. You would think that riot wants to make galio as appealing to the largest part of the playerbase as possible, but no. Not to mention i hate the way riot models wings (anivia, new galio, quinn, aatrox, kayle, morgana). Also only 3 of those are actually perpetually flying, {{champion:10}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:3}}  , and they're going to axe one of them, which leaves only {{champion:34}} {{champion:10}}
Agreed. I like his current color scheme/visual design... I feel like Riot's changing it just for the sake of changing it.
who are all you people that suddenly like old galio? I haven't seen a single galio in league since the last time urf let you pick your champs
Easy answer. We're talking about his visuals; I love his visuals. It's his gameplay that I didn't like. And gameplay concerns were what stopped me from playing him.

he can only target allies tho
sauce?

Edit: it will work in a unique way, it will only target allies, but it will not fly TO the ally, the target place will be left where you clicked on the ally to fly, so if the ally move it won't move with ihm

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5xv3ku/im_here_youre_welcome_galio/del5iby/
looking at the teaser, it seems like they added a split angled skillshot from aatrox's kit too xD

I was expecting something like 

"So he can QQ better!" 

Then realized this wasn't a M&G post.
Well a Rioter said that it can only be casted on an ally's position and it does not follow them. Kinda kewl if you ask me plus encourages teamwork in an effective way.

Galio: GO BAIT THE ENEMY TEAM ADC
ADC:  OKI
*3...2..1...AN ALLY HAS BEEN SLAIN*
ADC: WTF REPORT DIS GALIOO NUB
GALIO: STFU YOU DIED FAST, I SAID BAIT NOT GO 1V5.
Pretty sure an Adc shouldn't ever bait a 1v5 lol.

Oh, I guess they got galio, but didn't care about Aatrox.

Aatrox is getting a full VGU with the divers update.

For now, he is getting "fixed" a little bit to give him some love until then. Those changed for Aatrox, are on Surr@20
Full VGU? Lol. No, his visuals and voice are up to par, and there's no VGUs in class updates. He's just getting a big spot in the class update.

and yet they are killing the only way I play aatrox and will have no good game to pick him in
high sustained hybrid damage that does very well into champs that bring burst without much sustained damage.
He wants to fight you, and you blow your cd's then he fights you again.
however {{item:3124}} into full tank is no longer gonna be the go to build even though it was super fun because it was so hard to die and the longer the fight went the scarier you got
Can Yasuo still R on his Q?
Yasuo can R on every *Knock-up* except Poppy's R

I know that. I mean this interaction is retarded. :D

Btw. He can R not only on knock-ups.
And in regards to interaction. He could R on blast cone "victims". They removed that for obvious reasons.
He can R into Dragon's Almighty push when you hit dragon. Not many know about this interaction. :D

You misunderstood again.
You wrote "knock-up". Displacements that make champion airborne are not only knock-ups.
Oooh. I Know about that but didn't know they were called displacements.
